'''Prithiva Topaz''' are gemstones of varying quality used in the [[Characters#Ascensions|ascension]] of [[character]]s.

Prithiva Topaz is associated with the [[Geo]] element.

==Types==
{{Material Quality
|2=Prithiva Topaz Sliver
|3=Prithiva Topaz Fragment
|4=Prithiva Topaz Chunk
|5=Prithiva Topaz Gemstone
}}

==Full Description==
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood."<br />
"For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future."<br />
"This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."

==Trivia==
* The item description is narrated by [[Morax]].

===Etymology===
*The English name for this item derives "Prithiva" from {{w|Prithvi}}, a Vedic goddess of earth with many epithets, including "Mother Earth" and "Steady One."
*In the Chinese version, "Prithiva" is instead {{Lang|mini=1|zh=坚牢|zh_rm=Jiānláo|zh_tl=Firm, Steady}}.
